categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starship classes

nodes.text: The Firespray-31-class patrol and attack craft, also known simply as a Firespray-class interceptor, was a patrol ship manufactured by Kuat Systems Engineering. Firesprays were used to guard and patrol the prison moon Oovo 4, while bounty hunters Jango Fett and Boba Fett piloted a customized Firespray named Slave I throughout their career, which Jango had stolen from Oovo IV. Another bounty hunter, Koshka Frost, also flew her own Firespray-31. Amid a stalemate during the Outer Rim Sieges of the Clone Wars, a Firespray-31 was flown by a pro-Confederacy of Independent Systems racketeer.
